summary: A scientist creating perfumes inherits his great grandfather Dr. Jekyll's formula and decides to use modern technology to improve it. He ends up as an ambitious, ruthless woman. She tries to prevent returning into the spineless man.
cast: Sean Young|Tim Daly|Lysette Anthony|Stephen Tobolowsky|Harvey Fierstein|Thea Vidale|Jeremy Piven|Polly Bergen|Stephen Shellen|Sheena Larkin|John Franklyn-Robbins|Aron Tager|Jane Connell|Julie Cobb|Kim Morgan Greene|Victor Knight|Mark Camacho|Robert Wuhl|Susan Trustman|Manon Deschenes|Jean-Claude Pagé|Maria Stanton|Donna Barnes|Rachel Bertrand|Herb Goldstein|Michael Rudder|Susan Glover|Kate Asner|Liz Larson|Mike Hodge|Stéphane Lefebvre|Don Jordan|Donna Sarrasin|Anthony Backman|Liz Larsen|Christina Wickers
keywords: male objectification|modern day adaptation|female psychopath|female sex abuser|female on male rape
title: Dr. Jekyll y Mrs. Hyde
